website.title: Bunda Bakery Shop
website.description: Watch your favorite movies on our platform with a vast library. Enjoy seamless payments through Midtrans, ensuring convenience and security.
website.long_desc: A fresh beginning towards better learning. Enhance your knowledge with our online courses, guided by field experts. Join today and unlock your full potential virtually!
website.problem: The increasing demand for remote learning is on the rise.
website.solution: An online class website that enables learning to take place anytime, anywhere.
website.tech_stack: Laravel, reactJS, nodeJS, expressJS, Postman API, tailwind
